name: Blood Roofs
description:
★ Gametrailers.com *App of the Day* (Sept.11th): "Some of the best games for iPhone and iPad come out of nowhere. Just look at Blood Roofs"

★ The App Shack rates 9/10: "The graphics for Blood Roofs are outstanding."(...)"With a crazy amount of content and replay value, Blood Roofs is a great deal"

★ Toucharcade states "impressive visuals, and some really interesting monster designs"(...)"Blood Roofs is a pretty neat departure from the norm"

★ Featured at Appolicious.com under "New iPhone Apps worth downloading": "Spectacular-Looking"!

Experience breathtaking 3D run-and-gun action on top of a gigantic cityscape!

Watch the trailer video here: http://youtu.be/7AHjHIpikM8?hd=1

Chased by dreadful monsters, Jake must carry Catherine, the wounded girl - and run for both of their lives! Yet, she is armed and still tough enough to shoot a way through the deadly hordes.

Can you help the duo on their desperate escape over the rooftops of the city? But be careful: Don't let them fall down into the fog - who knows what may lurk inside...

Unlock warp gates to directly proceed to the next level.

Encounter colossal creatures and gigantic boss beasts that have been summoned by some sinister cultists.
And, eventually, you might come across some more survivors who would need Jake's help...

Introducing a unique new kind of double character action with touch and tilt controls! Collect mystic coins to unlock power ups and special features for your battle against the dark breed.

Optimized for the new iPad, iPhone 5 and iPhone 4S with antialiasing at 60 frames per second and crystal clear Retina graphics.

Get ready for a thrilling 3D thunderstorm with full scene realtime specularity!

Features Game Center leaderboards and achievements as well as iCloud integration to sync persistent unlocks on all your devices.
